title: Checking in on the Chickens in their New Coop

tasks.task: Check and manage winter chicken coop conditions
subtasks: Verify current coop smells and identify cause
Allow chickens to scratch and distribute new bedding material
Monitor chickens' behavior and eating habits with fresh hay
Adjust nest box access control for cleanliness
Time egg collection (around 5 o'clock after work)
Ensure eggs are clean and nest boxes remain dry
Monitor duck water consumption (around 50 gallons weekly)
Address excessive water use (likely due to mess)
Maintain appropriate water levels for ducks
Prepare for pigs' return from butcher shop
Anticipate breakdown of pork and meat obtained
Plan feed and cost analysis post-processing

tasks.task: Engage with audience via social media
subtasks: Respond to comments and inquiries about coop and livestock
Encourage subscriptions and social media follow
Promote interaction through like and comment actions
